content:
We are currently on the lookout for someone willing to take over the administration of the Lean Game Server. By this, we mean resetting the server whenever it is down, and taking care of regular updates. It should not be a lot of work, and it is not expected to involve any active development. But someone needs to do it, and we need to find someone by January 2025.

We would like to offer this as a paid job, in one of the following two ways:

remote “Hiwi” opportunity

If you are matriculated as a student at a German university, and will be so for another one or two years, we can offer to pay you on an hourly basis. Please get in touch!

Postdoc opportunity in Düsseldorf

There's also potential for a postdoc opportunity in Düsseldorf with the following parameters:

  • duration 1 or 2 years, starting as soon as possible and no later than January 2025
  • salary 100% EG13 (= usual postdoc salary in Germany)
  • main duty: administration of the Lean Game Server
  • teaching duties of 4h per week, in German, in Düsseldorf

If your research interests overlap with any of the existing research activities at Düsseldorf, that will be considered a considerable bonus. In any case, just contact me, directly via Zulip or via <marcus.zibrowius@hhu.de>, if this might be of interest for you.
